title: Digital Animation, 2008
description: Digital animation featuring the text "Échirolles Mois du Graphisme 21 Novembre 2008 - 31 Janvier 2009" emerging and receding in gray, pink, purple and white to the music of Maurice Ravel.
justification: This animation, designed in 2008 to promote a graphic arts festival held annually in Échirolles, a small town in France, reflects Philippe Apeloig’s longstanding interest in dance. The text first emerges as flat gray letterforms. As the individual letters grow and recede in tandem with the music of Maurice Ravel, their colors transform to multi-layered pink, purple, black, and white. The animation varies with each musical note, emphasizing the near-abstract forms of each letter against their legibility as a whole group.

tombstone.epitaph: Digital Animation, 2008. Digital animation. Gift of Philippe Apeloig. 2013-16-7.
